extends java.lang.Object
    this class is to add marble and rotate parts automatically

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int[] findBestRotation(int numberOfPlayer, int typeOfPlay)
      this method rotate each part in 2 direction and compare status of map before and after rotation it puts difference between status of bot and opponent in an array then compare rotations to each other and chose the best one based on change of status
      int[] findBestSpot(int numberOfPlayer)
      this method check all empty spots and return the location that make longest trial possible or stop longest trial of opponent using find trial method which is in play ground class
      int[] getStatus(int numberOfPlayer)
      this method return a array which includes 4 number number of trials of bot and opponent and length of their longest trial

      • findBestSpot

        public int[] findBestSpot(int numberOfPlayer)
        this method check all empty spots and return the location that make longest trial possible or stop longest trial of opponent using find trial method which is in play ground class

        Returns:

      • getStatus

        Returns:

      • findBestRotation

        public int[] findBestRotation(int numberOfPlayer,
                              int typeOfPlay)
        this method rotate each part in 2 direction and compare status of map before and after rotation it puts difference between status of bot and opponent in an array then compare rotations to each other and chose the best one based on change of status
        Parameters:
        numberOfPlayer - is number of player
        typeOfPlay - is a variable which determine priority is winning and making trial or defending and stop opponent from making trial
        Returns:
        a array that includes number of part and direction
